["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Arch Linux 中文社区仓库 是由 Arch Linux
中文社区驱动的非官方用户仓库。包含中文用户常用软件、工具、字体/美化包等。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["完整的包信息列表（包名称/架构/维护者/状态）请",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/archlinuxcn/repo","rel":"nofollow","children":"点击这里"}],"查看。"]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[" 官方仓库地址：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://repo.archlinuxcn.org","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://repo.archlinuxcn.org"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["使用方法：在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/pacman.conf"}]," 文件末尾添加以下两行："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"[archlinuxcn]
Server = {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/$arch","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["之后通过以下命令安装 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"archlinuxcn-keyring"}]," 包导入 GPG key。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}pacman -Sy archlinuxcn-keyring","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: Arch Linux CN 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
